title: Perform a Kitting Task
description: An operator is assigned a work order to assemble a 'gift basket' kit from several individual items.

tasks.description: Retrieve the kitting work order, which lists the component items and the quantity of kits to assemble.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the components and target quantity.

tasks.description: Pick the required quantities of all component items from their storage locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary components at the kitting station.

tasks.description: Assemble the kits according to instructions, then report the completion of the work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reports 50 kits assembled. The system deducts the component inventory and adds 50 units of the new kit SKU.
